alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 8:28PM CDT until May 11 at 9:18AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River near Arnold. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River near Eureka. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, Hornecker Road is closed near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Sunday was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling to 6.6 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Meramec River Eureka 19.0 25.2 22.0 12.4 8.7 7.7 7.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
